name: jamers
text: His warring days may be over, but he knew what to do in an emergency like that, wheelchair or no.

name: ssddr
text: I can just see that guy. wheelchair at least 10 years old, long unkempt hair, low, gravely voice.

name: mira
text: I saw that guy take the bus to Hooters one time.

name: molesticide
text: i sell that guy dates on a regular basis.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: You...what? Are you a pimp?

name: mattylite
text: Or an exotic fruit salesman?

name: d3athcann0n
text: He's an erotic fruit salesman

name: liamc
text: This is a perfect little staircase of banter.

name: soticoto
text: I have a hankering for some dried fruit about now.

name: spinynorman
text: Hooters does indeed have a monopoly on the crazy old man market.

name: notcool
text: Once upon a time, my brother and I were eating at a Taco Bell in downtown Denver, on 16th Street Mall, and there was the exact guy from this comic strip - only he had been homeless for about ten years and had a growly voice that sounded like it'll do a death metal band proud. This man, he spoke the greatest crazy talk that I have ever had the privelige to hear. At one point, apropos of nothing, he screamed/growled out, "I know everything!" And for a single, perfect moment of terror, I was truly and sincerely convinced that he DID know everything, and that his condition was the inevitable result.

name: puguglypress
text: The 16th street mall? That sounds like an average day there.

name: shutup_shutup
text: As a former pawn shop employee, I can tell you that Hooters is not the only place where crazy old men congregate.

name: centipede_damascus
text: A comment left by centipede_damascus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, wildcat, Connellingus, Wolfslice)

name: idsyen
text: I'm standing here, totally not returning your high-five.

name: epicurus
text: I was on the bus with that guy recently.

name: nighttoad
text: whoa, was it the same bus mira saw him taking to hooters?

name: tekende
text: oh necessarily

name: retardo
text: A comment left by retardo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by riotdejaneiro, Overmedicated, Jesler729, chivalress, catgrl131, aquamuffin, nutmeg, Wulvaine, eRiUukFJk, tellumo, thatskotkid)

name: achilleselbow
text: Who lamed this? God, some of you people are like crazy cat ladies with respect to Philippe.

name: puguglypress
text: Can you think of any other reason it may have been lamed?

name: idsyen
text: Is this a Retardo comment... with absolutely no reference to homosexuality? My mind is blown.

name: wite_rabit
text: Just read it as "fuck that otter".

name: puguglypress
text: That otter is Philippe.

name: soticoto
text: Philippe is five.

name: ted0phile
text: I always make sure to chubby comments made by retardo that don't involve him being an idiot, just for a little positive reinforcement.

name: elohssa
text: Lyle doesn't give me many, but this is a classic.

name: 60teeth
text: A comment left by 60teeth was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, HeyMan, dasilodavi)

name: anzio
text: Lyle is a stuffed tiger.

name: shogun
text: I've started using this in the kitchen, when somebody drops something or injures themselves.  "Man down, Ethan" from Mission: Impossible works, too.

name: kilroywashere
text: Veteran or veterinarian?

name: norm
text: Panels 3 through 5: Lyle getting left hanging on a high-five.

name: hyetal
text: Either that or he's a fan of Hitler.

name: tekende
text: Nah, I think he's just...pontificating. You know? With his arm held out for emphasis and excitement.

name: soticoto
text:
A high-four.
Lyle apparently only has four digits on that hand... and the thumb is intact, so he probably only has four (or less) on the other one too.

name: bhlaab
text: this is one of the best ones

name: spoids
text: Oh god that last panel. I have tears.

name: charchar
text:
*Take some dry ice, put it in a plastic soda bottle. *Add a little bit of cold water, then screw on the cap and throw it as hard as you can as far as you can.
*Expectantly await the satisfying "Pop!"
*Repeat until grounded.

name: cycerin
text: Absurd scenario descriptions out of the mouth of great characters like in the last panel here is partly why I love achewood.

name: zapatos
text:
"You got a man down," he said.

ha ha ha[/laughter]

name: aseidel
text: this is such civil interaction for Lyle and Phillipe...crazy.
